column2: General information about the data in a key-value-structure, it requires the following keys (i.e. number of elements in the data): n_timesteps, n_substations, n_control_units, n_measurement_units, n_profiles_hp
Information about how many global PV feedin time series exist per orientation
List of all known addresses with yearly energy demand in case of heat pump heating
